mapper.select: select SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, STATUS, STATUSNAME, STATUSFLAG, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, RESERVE15, RESERVE16, RESERVE17, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, MEMBER, CUSTOMERNAME, ALIAS1, ALIAS2, ALIAS3, ALIAS4, APPOINTMEMBER, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11 from db_task where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, STATUS, STATUSNAME, STATUSFLAG, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPENFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, RESERVE15, RESERVE16, RESERVE17, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, MEMBER, CUSTOMERNAME, ALIAS1, ALIAS2, ALIAS3, ALIAS4, APPOINTMEMBER, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11 from db_task
mapper.sql: SID , STYPE , STYPENAME , OPER , OPERTIME , TOOPER , TOOPERTIME , STATUS , STATUSNAME , STATUSFLAG , SLEVEL , CHECKRESULT , SCORES , CHECKOPER , CHECKTIME , PUBLICFLAG , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , ENDTIME , DATEDIFF , CORPID , OPENFLAG , CUSTOMERTYPE , RESERVE6 , RESERVE7 , RESERVE12 , RESERVE13 , RESERVE14 , RESERVE15 , RESERVE16 , RESERVE17 , TITLE , QUESTION , ANSWER , CHECKDESCR , MEMBER , CUSTOMERNAME , ALIAS1 , ALIAS2 , ALIAS3 , ALIAS4 , APPOINTMEMBER , RESERVE8 , RESERVE9 , RESERVE10 , RESERVE11

SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STYPENAME = #{stypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
TOOPER = #{tooper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TOOPERTIME = #{toopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUSNAME = #{statusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUSFLAG = #{statusflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SLEVEL = #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKRESULT = #{checkresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SCORES = #{scores,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PUBLICFLAG = #{publicflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
DATEDIFF = #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERTYPE = #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE6 = #{reserve6,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE7 = #{reserve7,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE12 = #{reserve12,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE13 = #{reserve13,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE14 = #{reserve14,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE15 = #{reserve15,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE16 = #{reserve16,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
RESERVE17 = #{reserve17,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CHECKDESCR = #{checkdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
MEMBER = #{member,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERNAME = #{customername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ALIAS1 = #{alias1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ALIAS2 = #{alias2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ALIAS3 = #{alias3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ALIAS4 = #{alias4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
APPOINTMEMBER = #{appointmember,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE8 = #{reserve8,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE9 = #{reserve9,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE10 = #{reserve10,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
RESERVE11 = #{reserve11,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
